DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and efficacy of masitinib 6 mg/kg/day versus placebo in the treatment of patients with primary progressive multiple sclerosis or relapse-free secondary progressive multiple sclerosis.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2b/3 Study to Compare Efficacy and Safety of Masitinib to Placebo in the Treatment of Patients With Primary Progressive or Relapse-free Secondary Progressive Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: 1.
